snippet: A father on the Upper East Side persistently asked neighbors, legislators and the Transportation Department to heed his simple request: for a safe way for him and his daughter to walk to the park.
abstract: Traffic light raised at corner of East 85th Street and East End Avenue on the Upper East Side of New York City comes after six-year fight by David Bookstaver, who was concerned about safe crossing to Carl Schurz Park.
lead_paragraph: A father on the Upper East Side persistently asked neighbors, legislators and the Transportation Department to heed his simple request: for a safe way for him and his daughter to walk to the park.

headline.seo: Traffic Safety Campaigner on Upper East Side Celebrates a Win
headline.main: Traffic Safety Campaigner Finally Achieves His Goal
headline.print_headline: Traffic Safety Campaigner Finally Achieves His Goal
